snippet.title: What is Wicked Lands? Introduction to our Turn Based Tactical Roguelike - Devlog 0
snippet.description:
🔥 Wicked Lands is now on Steam! 🔥Head over and add it to your wishlist, every single addition helps us a lot! 
👉https://store.steampowered.com/app/1584410

In this video I'm going to give you a brief introduction to Wicked Lands, the game we are currently developing. 

👇If you have any questions, lets us know in the comments!

📣If you want to stay up to date and want a chance to get into future playtests, please subscribe, join our Discord server and follow us on Twitter! 
Discord: https://discord.gg/HVyzPqt
Twitter: https://twitter.com/hugging_dragons

Looking forward to see you!

Wicked Lands is a turn based tactics game with roguelike elements. It is developed in Unity, by a small indie studio called Hugging Dragons.
